purpose: To outline the use case for cobranded credit card customer lifecycle management.
title: Cobrand credit card customer lifecycle management

bullets.text: After initial credit card sign up, the airline saw low spending in the first few months of card ownership
What activities and capabilities should the airline take to increase the scope of its customer lifecycle strategies?
Facilitated a cross-functional workshop to create a sense of urgency and brainstorm pain points / ideas
Analyzed customer spending data to validate pain points and segment customers by level of card engagement
A robust schedule of 22 customer engagement initiatives was developed to drive early lift in card spend
Cross-functional stakeholders were engaged to create alignment for a coordinated implementation effort

reasoning_strategy: Structured problem-solving approach with workshops and data analysis.
layout: Three sections highlighting Situation, Approach, and Path Forward.
